name: RaKoval~Nya: Escape Edition
description: Our whole life is an RKN, and you are in it - Telegram. In this war, only the strongest will survive, who will be able to bypass all blockades and invasions of enemies..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel celeron Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 480 Storage: 120 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel core DUO Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Radeon R7 265 Storage: 120 MB available space
